item.title: Dataset, MSK COVID-19 12 July 2021
item.description: # This is a daily report on COVID-19 Moscow dataset. Code source for this report is here. Cyclicity estimates ## Weekly diag. cyclicity coeffs:; 1.01; 0.86; 0.83; 1.09; 1.10; 1.09; 1.06 ## Weekly hosp. cyclicity coeffs:; 0.89; 1.04; 1.01; 1.04; 1.05; 1.05; 0.94 From cyclicity coeffs we may guess that hospitalizations are really 5 days lagged relative to newly diagnosted. Trends ## [1] 266 Latest data table ## date new_diag new_diag_corr new_diag_week_av new_hosp new_hosp_corr ## 1: 2021-07-06 5498 6360.
